title: How to Prepare Tuna Salad Without Mayonnaise

steps.headline: Prepare the tuna.
steps.description: Crack open the can of tuna with a can opener. Drain the tuna making sure to get out all the water or oil.

steps.headline: Add tuna and avocado into a bowl.
steps.description: Scoop the tuna out of the can with a spoon then include the avocado with the tuna.

steps.headline: Mash together.
steps.description: With a fork begin to squash the avocado and tuna together until well combined.

steps.headline: Add the leftover ingredients.
steps.description: Once the tuna and avocado are mashed up incorporate the carrot, lemon juice, dried dill weed and smoked paprika into the tuna mixture.

steps.headline: Combine together.
steps.description: Using a spoon mix it all up until well combined.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Decide how you want to enjoy the tuna salad. Use it to make a sandwich, salad, lettuce cups, sandwich wrap or even just eat it plain.

text: Prepare the tuna. Crack open the can of tuna with a can opener. Drain the tuna making sure to get out all the water or oil. Add tuna and avocado into a bowl. Scoop the tuna out of the can with a spoon then include the avocado with the tuna. Mash together. With a fork begin to squash the avocado and tuna together until well combined. Add the leftover ingredients. Once the tuna and avocado are mashed up incorporate the carrot, lemon juice, dried dill weed and smoked paprika into the tuna mixture. Combine together. Using a spoon mix it all up until well combined. Serve. Decide how you want to enjoy the tuna salad. Use it to make a sandwich, salad, lettuce cups, sandwich wrap or even just eat it plain.
